resources.string:
Hi, my name is Thomas. 

This is my second project using Kotlin. 

I am hoping to practice Kotlin really well for 2 months. 

I do not know what else to write. 

So I am writing some random things. 

In the app make it feel I have written an lot of stuff 

Honestly speaking, I am just repeating the same thing over and over again to make it longer and use the scroll feature. 

OK still the scroll has not started so I am just writing some other things. 

 I hope it is now long enough for the scroll to start.
